question: Can you help me understand how my loan repayment schedule will be affected if I increase my principal payments?
true_answer: Increasing principal payments generally reduces the total interest paid and shortens the loan term.

errors: Misinterpretation of the question led to incorrect focus on interest rate rather than repayment impact.

loan_plan.current_objective: Understand impact of increased principal payments

steps.content: Can you help me understand how my loan repayment schedule will be affected if I increase my principal payments?
Creating plan: 1) Clarify query. 2) Retrieve knowledge on repayments. 3) Return the answer.
Interpreting user query about loan repayment schedule.
Misinterpreted the focus on interest rates instead of principal impacts.
Retrieving knowledge on interest rates after additional payments.
Current knowledge indicates extra payments reduce interest but misunderstood principal impact.
Updating plan to focus on interest rate impacts.
Making extra payments can lower your interest over time.
Review: Lack of focus on principal change and impact on schedule.
Feedback: Misinterpretation detected, need to revisit user objective.
Misinterpretation error resulted in incomplete assistance.
Memory inconsistency: Objective not adequately addressed in plan.
